requirements.summary: Update centralized business phone constants and ensure all UI phone text/links use the new number with correct display and tel digits, with no remaining references to the old number.
acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/content/businessInfo.ts, businessInfo.phone.display is "(781) 227-0994" and businessInfo.phone.tel is "7812270994".
All rendered phone links (e.g., footer and contact page) display "(781) 227-0994" and use href="tel:7812270994".
The string "(844) 527-3733" does not appear anywhere in the frontend source or rendered pages.

file_operations.description: Replace businessInfo.phone.display and businessInfo.phone.tel values to use the new phone number "(781) 227-0994" and tel digits "7812270994" so all consumers update site-wide.

Audit and ensure the footer phone link strictly uses businessInfo.phone.display for visible text and businessInfo.phone.tel for the tel: href, and remove/replace any accidental hardcoded references to the old number if present.

Audit and ensure all contact page phone links/text strictly use businessInfo.phone.display for visible text and businessInfo.phone.tel for the tel: href, and remove/replace any accidental hardcoded references to the old number if present.
